statements: DELETE FROM sound_library WHERE category = 'music' AND duration > 5.0;
DELETE FROM sound_effects WHERE id = 10 OR name = 'Explosion' AND category = 'Action';
DELETE FROM samples WHERE name = 'Drum Roll' OR type = 'Instrument' AND duration > 3.5;
DELETE FROM metadata WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND mood = 'Happy';
DELETE FROM samples WHERE size > 1000 AND type = 'Music';
DELETE FROM sound_effects WHERE sound_name = 'Explosion' AND duration > 5;
DELETE FROM sample_libraries WHERE creator = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM library_content WHERE library_id = 1 AND sound_id = 5;
DELETE FROM sound_effects WHERE format = 'mp3' AND size >= 100;
